name: Mohamed Alaa
title: Instructional Designer & E-learning Specialist
heroSubtitle: I craft learner-centered, interactive content with a passion for innovation and game-based learning.

about.summary: Passionate instructional designer with 3+ years of experience creating engaging e-learning solutions. I specialize in transforming complex concepts into interactive, learner-centered experiences that drive real results.
about.fullBio:
Mohamed Alaa is an experienced Instructional Designer and E-learning Specialist with a proven track record of developing innovative learning solutions. With expertise in modern learning technologies, game-based learning, and SCORM development, Mohamed has helped organizations transform their training programs and achieve measurable learning outcomes.

His approach combines pedagogical best practices with cutting-edge technology to create engaging, effective learning experiences. From corporate training modules to educational games, Mohamed's work consistently delivers results that exceed expectations.
